description: The robot's gripper performs a Power:Large Diameter grasp on the Pringles can by contacting its cylindrical body to lift it.
contact_details: The robot's gripper is grasping the Pringles can around its cylindrical body. The gripper appears to be a two-fingered parallel gripper, with each finger making contact with the surface of the can. The fingers are positioned to provide a stable hold, likely with the goal of lifting or moving the can.
